Class UnavailableDateController

java.lang.Object
control.user.UnavailableDateController
public class UnavailableDateController extends Object
Controller for managing unavailable dates for hospital staff.

  • Method Details

    • addUnavailability

      public static String addUnavailability(HospitalStaff staff, LocalDateTime date) throws InvalidInputException
      Adds an unavailable date for the specified hospital staff.
      Parameters:
      staff - The hospital staff for whom the date is being added.
      date - The date to be marked as unavailable.
      Returns:
      A success message if the date is added successfully.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the staff or date is null, or if the date is already marked as unavailable.

    • removeUnavailability

      public static Boolean removeUnavailability(UnavailableDate unavailableDate) throws EntityNotFoundException, InvalidInputException
      Removes an unavailable date for the specified hospital staff.
      Parameters:
      unavailableDate - The unavailable date to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the date is removed successfully.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the unavailable date is not found.
      InvalidInputException - If the unavailable date is null.

    • getUnavailableDates

      public static List<UnavailableDate> getUnavailableDates(HospitalStaff staff) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves a list of unavailable dates for the specified hospital staff.
      Parameters:
      staff - The hospital staff for whom the unavailable dates are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of unavailable dates for the staff.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the staff is null.

    • getUnavailableSlotsByDate

      public static List<LocalDateTime> getUnavailableSlotsByDate(HospitalStaff staff, LocalDate date) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves all unavailable slots (dates and times) for the specified doctor.
      Parameters:
      staff - The hospital staff for whom the unavailable slots are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of unavailable slots (dates and times) for the staff.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the staff is null.

    • getUnavailableDatesByDate

      public static List<UnavailableDate> getUnavailableDatesByDate(HospitalStaff staff, LocalDate date) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves a list of unavailable dates for the specified hospital staff on a given date.
      Parameters:
      staff - The hospital staff for whom the unavailable dates are being retrieved.
      date - The date to check for unavailability.
      Returns:
      A list of unavailable dates matching the given date.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the staff or date is null.

    • isDateUnavailable

      public static boolean isDateUnavailable(String staffId, LocalDateTime date) throws InvalidInputException
      Checks if a specific date is marked as unavailable for the given staff ID.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The ID of the hospital staff.
      date - The date to check for unavailability.
      Returns:
      True if the date is unavailable, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the staff ID is null or empty, or if the date is null.
